properties.name: CreateInOriginalOrganizationUnit
properties.description: Attach the order to the same OrganizationUnit as the returned order

properties.name: StockOrganizationUnitID
properties.description:
When the stock should be returned to a specific OrganizationUnit.

The available OrganizationUnits are returned from the GetReturnableStatusForOrder.StockOrganizationUnits
